name: Grasmere Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: After getting engaged along the way, we arrived at Grasmere Hotel. Beautiful and quiet little setting, we were greeted by Rob as we arrived in the car park. From that moment on Rob and his staff couldn't do enough to make our stay a pleasant one. Firstly we were upgraded to a superior room and Rob came up to check that everything was in place for us. Evening dinner was absolutely gorgeous and we couldn't believe the high quality of food and service for the guest discount of £19 for 4 courses! The most personal touch however was the way the staff marked our engagement; we were presented with a cake in the lounge after dinner and someone placed a card in our room whilst we were dinning!
reviews.title: Outstanding Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was spotless and the rooms beautifully decorated, our window view was overlooking the garden and the river at the bottom (every room in this hotel has a pleasant view) and the stay was extremely peaceful.
reviews.title: What a way to recharge the batteries!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are going to return to this hotel as soon as we can have another holiday as we were so taken by its quality yet outstanding value for money!
reviews.title: A lovely Easter break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I enjoyed an excellent two night break at the Grasmere hotel from 13th-15th April. The staff were exceptional and the team worked extremely hard to make our stay as relaxing as possible. The fact this hotel only has 11 rooms means everything feels so much more personal and intimate.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The weather left a lot to be desired (!) but it really didn't matter as we truly felt relaxed and energized during and after our break.
reviews.title: A Perfect Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This freshly revamped hotel was a total treat. I dont usually sleep at all well in hotels but had 2 nights gorgoeus sleep as the bed was so comfy. Great shower.The whole place is run like a well oiled machine -not a hint of disorder.
reviews.title: A hidden treasure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However the highlight was undoubtlebly the food. 4 courses of heaven - just been watching the masterchef series and it was something they would prepare on that show.The starter of pear baked with goats cheese and pancetta melted in your mouth, it was all so good.Hardest thing is deciding what to have.
reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from our first visit to the Grasmere Hotel for 5 nights. The recent refurbishment was done with flair and quality in furnishings and decor, especially the dining room. Our bathroom was large and so well fitted out that I had to take a photo to show the folks back home!
reviews.title: FANTASTIC 200%

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: The young staff were well trained, polite and very efficient. The food was of excellent quality and well presented with special mention for the fish dishes.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The attention to detail showed, with care being taken that everything was perfect. Well done Rob, Anton and your team - you gave us a lovely holiday and we will definitely be back.
reviews.title: Perfect in every way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from an exceptional stay at this superbly run hotel. A big thank you to Rob and all the staff for giving us such a pleasant stay with the real highlights being the food & the sumptuous newly refurbished rooms. The village of Grasmere is also delightful and even the sun was shining which was just the icing on the cake.
reviews.title: This is how a hotel should be run.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will be returning with friends in the near future. Well done to you all.
reviews.title: " Very nice hotel excellent food"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for two nights treating ourselves to a weekend break. Room absolutely great, just had complete redecoration, good balance between modern facilities and retaining of character. Lounge a great place to spend evening, log fire adds great character. Dining room overlooks garden and river. Evening meals and breakfasts excellent. Staff very friendly and efficient, owner great host always on hand. Very enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: John and Laura P
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, lovely food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights while discovering Lake District.
reviews.title: Well run hotel with excellent chef

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed here with returning friends who 'hoped we would like it'. Yes we did!
reviews.title: Good all round

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had a smartly decorated bedroom overlooking the garden, with a very modern bathroom. Everything ran very smoothly and the owner Rob and his staff were very pleasant. The Chef (also an owner) did a very good job of serving inviting, interesting and modern cuisine without leaving you feeling hungry! We enjoyed the ambience and setting of this hotel. We used the lounge for our evening recreation and this was nicely busy with happy guests!
reviews.title: Perfect hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: I stayed in the Grasmere Hotel for two nights with a party of 8 persons in total.
reviews.title: We'll be back!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located in the center of the village Grasmere, at a quiet and beautiful location of the village.
reviews.title: 4th time round!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception by the owner and his team is friendly and helpful at arrival and during our stay.
reviews.title: Keith & Jan

description: Lovely Victorian Country House Hotel in one of the most beautiful villages in the Lake District. Elegant lounge and restaurant overlooking the pretty garden.
